The device features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with 144Hz refresh rate, 1600 nits brightness, and HDR10+ support. It comes with up to 1TB of internal storage and 16GB of RAM, and supports expandable storage via microSD card. The triple rear camera setup includes a 50MP primary sensor, a 64MP periscope telephoto sensor, and a 50MP ultra-wide sensor, while the front-facing camera is a 16MP sensor. The device supports 8K video recording, 4K video recording at 24/30/60fps, and 1080p video recording at 30/60/120/240fps, along with gyro-EIS for stabilized video recording. The iQOO 12 Pro also features a 5100mAh battery that supports 120W wired charging and 50W wireless charging, and runs on Android 14 with Funtouch 14 (International) or OriginOS 4 (China) operating system. The device is available in Black, Red, and White colors and is priced around 650 EUR.

It comes with 32GB or 64GB of internal storage and 3GB of RAM, and has a microSDXC (dedicated slot) for expanding storage. The device has several sensors, including an accelerometer, and can respond to Alexa natural language commands and has a text-to-speech English-language content reader. The battery can last up to 13 hours and can be charged via a 15W wired or 10W wireless charger. The device is available in Gray and costs around 120 EUR.

With a 4860mAh battery and 10W wired charging, the Armor X12 Pro is sure to keep you connected and powered all day long. The device is available in black, white, and navy colors.

With its IP68/IP69K dust/water resistance and MIL-STD-810H compliance, this phone is built to withstand tough conditions. The Armor X12 features a 5.45-inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 720 x 1440 pixels, making it perfect for streaming content or browsing the web. The phone is powered by the Mediatek MT6761V/WAB Helio A22 chipset, which includes a quad-core 2.0 GHz Cortex-A53 CPU and a PowerVR GE8320 GPU. The main camera on the Armor X12 is a 13 MP sensor with f/2.2 aperture, PDAF, and LED flash, while the selfie camera is an 8 MP sensor with f/2.0 aperture. The phone also includes a range of connectivity options, including Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, NFC, and wireless FM radio. With a 4860 mAh non-removable battery, the Armor X12 is designed to keep you connected and powered up all day long. Available in Black, Black/Orange, and Black/Green colors, the Ulefone Armor X12 is the perfect choice for anyone who needs a reliable and durable smartphone.

The phone runs on the Android 13 operating system and is powered by the Mediatek MT6765 Helio G37 chipset. It has an octa-core CPU with four 2.3 GHz Cortex-A53 cores and four 1.7 GHz Cortex-A53 cores, as well as a PowerVR GE8320 GPU. The phone has 4/6GB of RAM and comes with 128GB or 256GB of internal storage, which can be expanded with a microSDXC card. The main camera on the phone is a triple setup with 50 MP, 2 MP macro, and 2 MP depth sensors, and it supports LED flash and 1080p video recording at 30fps. The selfie camera on the phone is a single 8 MP sensor that supports 1080p video recording at 30fps. The phone has a range of connectivity options, including Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Bluetooth 5.1, A2DP, LE, GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO, QZSS, NFC, and a USB Type-C 3.0 port. The phone also has a range of sensors, including a fingerprint scanner, an accelerometer, a proximity sensor, and a compass. The battery on the phone is a 5010 mAh, non-removable Li-Ion battery that supports 18W wired charging. The phone is available in two colors: blue and dark blue, and it is priced at around 180 EUR.

It features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display with a resolution of 1179 x 2556 pixels and a pixel density of 461 ppi. The device supports 4K video recording at 24/25/30/60fps, 1080p video recording at 25/30/60/120/240fps, and HDR. The iPhone 15 also features Face ID for secure biometric authentication, and it supports wireless charging via MagSafe and Qi. The device runs on iOS 17 and is available in Black, Blue, Green, Yellow, and Pink colors. The iPhone 15 is priced at €899.00 / $779.99 / £779.00 / ₹79,900.
